message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.MM 

This paper focuses on multi-person action forecasting in videos, which involves analyzing and predicting human actions in visual data. This task is closely related to computer vision (cs.CV) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI), as it requires understanding and modeling complex visual scenes and human behavior. The proposed method also involves constructing a recurrent graph and learning discriminative relations, which are common techniques in machine learning (cs.LG) and robotics (cs.RO). Finally, the evaluation of the method involves action classification, which is a common task in multimedia (cs.MM) research.
